name: Gen6 SN Scarlet Emerald
bio: What's up! I'm Gen6 SN Scarlet Emerald. I'm a Aerobics Athlete  by day, and I like playing chess by night. I put ghost pepper hot sauce on everything. Like, everything: hot dogs, ice creamâ€”everything! Our friendship will be wondrous, gullible, and full of salad.
